Package org.nineml.coffeefilter.trees

Class SimpleTreeBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler
      • org.nineml.coffeefilter.trees.AbstractTreeBuilder
        • org.nineml.coffeefilter.trees.SimpleTreeBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.xml.sax.ContentHandler, org.xml.sax.DTDHandler, org.xml.sax.EntityResolver, org.xml.sax.ErrorHandler
    public class SimpleTreeBuilder
extends AbstractTreeBuilder
    Construct a SimpleTree.

    This builder can be passed to InvisibleXmlDocument.getTree() to build a SimpleTree.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SimpleTreeBuilder

        public SimpleTreeBuilder​(ParserOptions options)
        Create a default simple tree builder.

        The default builder does not ignore whitespace nodes.

        Parameters:
        options - The parser options.

      • SimpleTreeBuilder

        public SimpleTreeBuilder​(ParserOptions options,
                         boolean ignoreWhitespaceNodes)
        Create a simple tree builder.

        If ignoreWhitespaceNodes is true, any text node that consists entirely of whitespace will be elided when the tree is constructed.

        Parameters:
        ignoreWhitespaceNodes - if true, text nodes containing only whitespace are ignored.
        options - The parser options.

    • Method Detail

      • getTree

        public SimpleTree getTree()
        Get the tree once constructed.

        This method will return the tree, if it has been contructed.

        Returns:
        the tree, or null if no tree has yet been (completely) constructed.

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Reset the builder.

        The builder isn't thread safe, but you can reuse it. Call reset between uses.

                         org.xml.sax.Attributes attributes)
                  throws org.xml.sax.SAXException
        Add an element to the SimpleTree.
        Specified by:
        startElement in interface org.xml.sax.ContentHandler
        Overrides:
        startElement in class org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler
        Parameters:
        uri - the element namespace URI, ignored.
        localName - the element local name, ignored.
        qName - The element QName, used as the name of the node.
        attributes - The element attributes.
